text: The Power of One is a 1992 American Australian German French drama movie directed by John G. Avildsen and was based on the 1989 novel of the same name by Bryce Courtenay. It stars Stephen Dorff, Morgan Freeman, Armin Mueller- Stahl, Simon Fenton, John Gielgud, Fay Masterson, Daniel Craig, Clive Russell, Winston Ntshona, Christien Anholt and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1992 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by John G. Avildsen Category:Movies about bullying Category:Movies about racism Category:Movies about race and ethnicity Category:Movies about Apartheid Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies set in Zimbabwe Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: The Power of One (movie)
